name: Monte Carlo Classic Solitaire
description:
Games of classic solitaire with the no-nonsense MmpApps card game interface. Totally free! No in-app purchases.

Match pairs of like-ranked cards to remove them from play. Push cards forward when you are stuck.

MONTE CARLO - Matching pairs must be adjacent on the grid. Push when strategically optimal to do so.

MONACO - Matching pairs must be in the same row or the same column. Push happens automatically.

RIVIERA - Matching pairs must be in the same row or the same column. Cards are immediately replaced.
